item.title: Small issue with thread per client[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

[quote=“mochronik, post:1, topic:275125”]a thread per client is when it lets you login only ONCE per IP address… but for mine it wont let me change it… lol if any1 can help me with this would be great help

public void banHost(String host, int num) {
	if (false) {
		banned.add(host);
	} else {
		try {
			misc.println("BANNING HOST " + host + " (flooding)");
			banned.add(host);
			delay = 2000;
			delayUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis() + 60000;
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

}

public boolean checkHost(String host) {
	for (String h : banned) {
		if (h.equals(host))
			return false;
	}
	int num = 0;
	for (String h : connections) {
		if (host.equals(h)) {
			num++;
		}
	}
	if (num > 1) {
		banHost(host, num);
		return false;
	}

	if (checkLog("ipbans", host)) {
		System.out.println("They are in ip ban list!");
		return false; // ip ban added by bakatool
	}[/quote]

If you mean change it so more then 1 can login, change the 1 in “if (num > 1) {” to what ever number

Read full topic
item.source: Small issue with thread per client[DELTA]

item.title: Small issue with thread per client[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @mochronik mochronik
item.description:
@mochronik wrote:

a thread per client is when it lets you login only ONCE per IP address… but for mine it wont let me change it… lol if any1 can help me with this would be great help

public void banHost(String host, int num) {
	if (false) {
		banned.add(host);
	} else {
		try {
			misc.println("BANNING HOST " + host + " (flooding)");
			banned.add(host);
			delay = 2000;
			delayUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis() + 60000;
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

}

public boolean checkHost(String host) {
	for (String h : banned) {
		if (h.equals(host))
			return false;
	}
	int num = 0;
	for (String h : connections) {
		if (host.equals(h)) {
			num++;
		}
	}
	if (num > 1) {
		banHost(host, num);
		return false;
	}

	if (checkLog("ipbans", host)) {
		System.out.println("They are in ip ban list!");
		return false; // ip ban added by bakatool
	}

Read full topic
